text: Keidran Jones (born 15 April 1987), better known by his stage name Iyaz, is a singer, songwriter and rapper. His song "Replay" reached number two on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2009. In December 2009, "Replay" was number one on the Billboard Pop Songs chart. It also reached number one in the UK Singles Chart on January 10, 2010. He made a song with Miley Cyrus called "Gonna Get This" for Hannah Montana. == Discography == === Studio albums === Year Title Peak chart positions US UK 2010 My Life * Debut studio album * Released: February 9, 2010 * Label: Warner Bros.
